metadata.title: CVE-2019-17674 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
WordPress before 5.2.4 is vulnerable to stored XSS (cross-site scripting) via the Customizer.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-17674` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4+dfsg1-1').
